name: Real Dinosaur Attack Simulator 3D – Destroy the city with deadly t-rex in this extreme game
name_original: Real Dinosaur Attack Simulator 3D – Destroy the city with deadly t-rex in this extreme game
description:
Play as a deadly dinosaur to kill and hunt down wild animals in this 3D simulator game. Dinosaur is the most wild and hungry animal lived on the planet. Chase down different wild animals for hunt them down and satisfy your hunger. Enjoy the Jurassic era take control over the ferocious beast and smash the whole jungle and animals. Animals will attack you; defend yourself attack those animals and burn them with your mighty fire.
This dinosaur simulator is consists of 10 missions of hunting. In this simulation game you will be entertained with multiple modes which includes free roam mode to roam freely & career mode to face multiple challenging task. In this game you will experience lifelike graphics and high quality sounds.

Features
• 10 levels of dinosaur’s prey journey
• Multiple wild animals to attack and hunt
• Free roam mode to explore jungle
• Career mode to feel the dinosaur hunting experience
• Life like graphics and high quality sounds
